description.value: The renegade makes saving throws against effects that daze or stun, including effects that don't normally end on a save, at both the start and the end of its turn.

At-Will ✦ psychic

Standard

Attack: Ranged 10 (one, two, or three creatures)

+17 vs. Will

Hit: 2d10 + 10 psychic damage, and the renegade pushes the target 3 squares.

Recharge when first bloodied ✦ necrotic

Standard

Attack: Close burst 3 (dazed enemies in the burst)

+14 vs. Fortitude

Hit: The target falls prone and is weakened (save ends).

Miss: 3d10 + 6 necrotic damage.

Effect: The renegade gains temporary hit points equal to 5 x the number of targets it hit with this power.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ necrotic

Standard

Attack: Close blast 5 (enemies in the blast)

+14 vs. Reflex

Hit: 3d10 + 6 necrotic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). While any target is dazed by this power, the renegade gains a +4 bonus to damage rolls.

Miss: Half damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ force, weapon

Minor

Attack: Melee 2 (one creature)

+18 vs. AC

Hit: 4d6 + 7 damage, and if the target does not end its next turn at least 2 squares away from the renegade, the target takes 6 force damage.

2/Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: The renegade takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage.

Effect (Free Action): The renegade gains resist 10 to the triggering damage type until the end of the encounter or until it uses variable resistance again.

At-Will ✦ force

Triggered

Trigger: The renegade is hit by an enemy that has combat advantage against it.

Attack (Immediate Reaction): Close burst 1 (the triggering enemy in the burst)

+16 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 4d6 + 6 force damage, and the renegade pushes the target 2 squares and knocks it prone.

Encounter

Triggered

Trigger: The renegade is first bloodied.

Effect (Free Action): Defiling blast recharges, and the renegade uses it.

system.biography:
HP 512; Bloodied 256Init +10 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 27Fort 25Ref 24Will 26
Speed 6
Ability ScoresStr 20 (+11)
Con 16 (+9)		Dex 18 (+10)
Int 8 (+5)		Wis 14 (+8)
Cha 22 (+12)
Languages Common, Giant
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +10, Insight +13, Nature +13Senses Low-light vision
Passive Perception 18 | Insight 23

Equipment dagger .
